wikipedia_page.main:
William 'Percy' Percival Morgan (1 January 1905 - 3 March 1983) was a Welsh cricketer.  Morgan was a right-handed batsman who bowled right-arm medium pace. He was born at Abercrave, Brecknockshire.
Morgan represented Glamorgan in a single first-class in 1925 against Nottinghamshire at St. Helen's.In 1935, he played 2 Minor Counties Championship matches for the Glamorgan Second XI against Oxfordshire and Dorset.Morgan died at Neath, Glamorgan on 3 March 1983.
